name: Pro Tools Session Template
summary: Learn about .PTT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Pro Tools templates allow you to create a custom arrangement that can be imported into your session to define settings and effects. You can import a template by selecting File → Import → Session Data....
NOTE: The PTT format was replaced by the newer .PTXT Template format in version 10 of Pro Tools.

description: Session template created and used by Pro Tools, an audio editing and production program; contains session data, which may include audio and software instrument tracks; also includes session parameters such as Sample Rate and Bit Depth.
